title: What is the meaning of “technology is a means to an end”? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let us start from basics: What is the meaning of end and means? a means to an end a thing that is not valued or important in itself but is useful in achieving an aim.End and means are compared or contrasted in several proverbial sayings,for example the end justifies the means ( see end ) andhe who wills the end wills the means .What does the name a mean? Definition of a means to an end : something done only to produce a desired resultFor her, marrying a rich man was just a means to an end. All she really cared about was money.Technology is a means to an end, not an end in itself. The phrase, “Technology is a means to an end,” recognizes that Technology consists entirely of tools — tools to do something else, literally anything else. Grammatically — the word “means” in the sentence refers to the resources we use to accomplish a goal. The word “end” in the sentence refers to the goal we seek to complete. Technology exists to make life easier. Most Technology consists of Labor-saving devices, although some exists simply for Entertainment. In any case, Technology never exists as an end-in-itself. Even the inventors hope to win a patent for their invention, and gain fame and fortune. In other words, Technology is again the means to their end.
